title: BlockBoost Giveaway
descr: As a part of community Block Boost offers high rewards to the active users and participants.
descr-two: We're excited to announce the launch of Block Boost with an amazing chance for 20 lucky winners to win $5000 USDT each! 🌟
descr-three: ✨ Join now and share with your friends for a chance to win! ✨
note: Note: A minimum $100 participation in the BlockBoost Presale is required to be eligible.
join-now: 👉 Join now and secure your spot among the winners!  🚀
provide-wallet-desc: Provide your ERC20 Wallet address to qualify for the giveaway.
maximize-chance: Follow all the steps carefully to maximize your chance of winning.
refer-friends: Refer Friends and Boost Your Entries
earn-entries: Earn +50 entries for every friend you refer.
follow-steps: Follow these steps for your shot at winning $50,000. Good luck! 🌟
